fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Once per game at night, reanimate a player from the graveyard. This will allow them to be visited at night and use abilities, but they cannot talk, vote or whisper.
- At any time, you may choose to fully resurrect a reanimated target, which will create a public announcement and allow them to function like a normal player.
- Swap roles with a player at night, with the exception of faction and goal staying the same. This happens after all other actions resolve that night. You cannot use this on the same night as another ability.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If you are alive and Metamorph-aligned in a Metamorph victory, that victory is nullified and the Good faction wins instead.
- You may target any player, even those whose role has been hidden (cleaned/stoned/devoured).
